testely.typescript.location.markdownDescription: Specifies where the tasks will be located.
markdownEnumDescriptions:
The tests will be created in the same directory. Example:

    src
     └── components 
         ├── Component.tsx 
         └── Component.test.tsx

The tests will be created in a nested directory inside the directory of the source file. Example:

    src
     └── components 
         ├── __test__
         │   └── Component.test.tsx
         └── Component.tsx

The tests will be created in a nested directory inside the directory of the source file. Example:

    src
     └── components 
         ├── __tests__
         │   └── Component.test.tsx
         └── Component.tsx

The tests will be created flat in a test at the project root directory. Example:

    src
     └── components 
         └── Component.tsx
    test
     └── Component.test.tsx

The tests will be created nested in a test at the project root directory. Example:

    src
     └── components 
         └── Component.tsx
    test
     └── components 
         └── Component.test.tsx
enum: same directory (next to the source file)

testely.typescript.fileExtension.markdownDescription: Specifies the file extension for test files.
markdownEnumDescriptions: The test files will have the .spec.ts extension.
The test files will have the .test.ts extension.

scripts.pretest: npm run compile && npm run lint
